name: 2048 with primes
description:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into the next prime. When 31 tile is created, the player wins!

This game is based on the original open source 2048 puzzle and it is free of advertising.

Download 2048 with primes from Google Play using this link 2048 with primes.

Find more by Tangled Games here: http://www.tangledgames.net
